metadata.name: Security Software Discovery - MacOs
metadata.comment: Detects usage of system utilities (only grep for now) to discover security software discovery

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/bin/grep') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nessusd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('santad')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cbdefense')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('falcond')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('td-agent')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('packetbeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('filebeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('auditbeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osqueryd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('blockblock')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lulu')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('little')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('snitch'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of system utilities (only grep for now) to discover security software discovery
